title: Website planning
text:
This website holds the information for The 15th Swedish Economic History Meeting to be held in Lund in 2023.


What needs to be done?

Decide on venues and update map and colours
Update programme
Find a nice way to format session abstracts




The plan is that you will be able to update the important parts of the website by only editing an excel sheet.
The sheet is stored on github called programme.




It looks like this:





You can download this from github, update it on your computer, and then either add it back to github or email it to me.
Then the website will update and include all of the new information!

title: Programme
text:
Here is where the programme will go in a nice table













Friday Oct 8th




Session 1: 8:30-10:30






Panel


Panel title


Venue






 Panel A1 


The History of small business as business history**


Room 1




 Panel B1 


Monetary policy: government actions and corporate finance in response to crises


Room 2




 Panel C1 


Historical Perspectives on Labor and Technological Change


Magna Charta




 Panel D1 


The Swedish Sonderweg debated


Seminar room 1104




 Panel E1 


The economic history of the music industry – from 1771 until today


Underground room




 Panel F1 


Urban Demography - New approaches using longitudinal micro-level data


LUB special collections




 Panel G1 


Human Capital (ZOOM session)


Another fun room
